level.text: A domestic nonprofit corporation planning to merge shall comply with Chapter 4 (Nonprofit Corporations) of the Act (D.C. Official Code ยง 29-401.01 et seq. (2011 Repl.)).
A foreign nonprofit corporation planning to merge shall comply with Chapter 4 (Nonprofit Corporations) of the Act (D.C. Official Code ยง 29-401.01 et seq. (2011 Repl.)).
A general cooperative association planning to merge shall comply with Chapter 4 (Nonprofit Corporations) of the Act.
